name: Copper rally
description:
Copper rally is a racing game developed in the Coppercube engine, inspired by the classic Sega rally. The objective of this game is to complete 5 laps on each circuit before time runs out. Collect clocks along the track to earn more valuable seconds, dodge obstacles and be victorious!

Use AWSD arrows to steer and Space to brake.

It is important to use the brakes on the curves so as not to get stuck in the walls and lose the race.

Warning: There may rarely be a small bug in the car selection and the game will return to the home screen. just repeat the selection to advance and play!

Night tracks are extremely challenging!
